DESCRIPTION:
Test that an admin user can upload a video thumbnail.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Video section
4. Upload a new video with random title
5. Upload/Change thumbnail for the video
6. Verify thumbnail is successfully uploaded
NAME: test_NAF_8_12_0_Upload_Thumbnail

DESCRIPTION:
Test Case: NAF-269
    As a user I want to create text or text + image posts to share with the community
    Scenario: Verify viewing comments on a post
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
    2. Go to "Community" tab
    3. Click on a comment button for any post
    4. Verify comment section opens
    5. Add a comment
    6. Verify comment is posted successfully
    
    Expected Result: User should be able to view and add comments to posts
NAME: test_NAF_14_2_0_verify_viewing_comments_on_post

DESCRIPTION:
Test that an admin user can delete a video using the 3 dots menu.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Video section
4. Upload a new video with random title
5. Delete the video using 3 dots menu
6. Verify video is successfully deleted
NAME: test_NAF_8_10_0_Delete_Video

DESCRIPTION:
Test Case: NAF-268
    As a user I want to create text or text + image posts to share with the community
    Scenario: Verify post fields after sending
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
    2. Go to "Community" tab
    3. Click "NEW POST" button
    4. Verify post input field is present and editable
    5. Enter text content
    6. Click "Post" button
    7. Verify post fields are cleared after sending
    
    Expected Result: Post input field should be present, editable, and cleared after posting
NAME: test_NAF_14_2_0_verify_post_fields_after_sending

DESCRIPTION:

DESCRIPTION:

DESCRIPTION:
Test Case: NAF-15
    As a user, I want to log in with my email and password
    Scenario: Login Unsuccessful due to Non-existent Email
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app
    2. Click on "Log in" button
    3. Click on "Sign in with your email" button
    4. Enter non-existent email: test@example.com
    5. Enter password: testpassword
    6. Click "Log in" button
    7. Verify error message appears
    
    Expected Result: Error message "There is no account associated with this email. Please sign up." should be displayed
NAME: test_NAF_2_2_0_login_with_wrong_email
